title: Moral Compass
description: What would you do? Difficult ethical dilemmas to test your values and spark debate.

cards.content: You find a wallet with $1,000 cash and an ID inside. The address is a huge mansion. Do you keep the cash?
You accidentally scratch a luxury car in a parking lot. No one saw you. Do you leave a note?
You find out your best friend's partner is cheating. Do you tell your friend?
A cashier gives you $20 extra change by mistake. Do you return it?
You can save 1 person you love or 5 strangers. Who do you save?
If you could get away with a crime that would make you rich but hurt no one physically, would you do it?
Would you lie in court to save a friend from going to jail for a crime they committed?
You have the power to turn invisible. Do you use it to spy on people?
You are offered $1 million to never speak to your best friend again. Do you take it?
Is it ever okay to steal food to feed a starving family?
Would you read your partner's diary if you knew they would never find out?
If you could peek into the future to see when you die, would you look?
You see a coworker stealing office supplies. Do you report them?
Would you cheat on a test if you knew you wouldn't get caught and it guaranteed you a scholarship?
If you could change the past by killing baby Hitler, would you do it?
A stranger leaves their phone at a cafe. Do you try to find them or keep it?
You are driving and hit a dog. It runs off. Do you stop to look for it or keep driving?
Would you accept a job that pays double your salary but supports a cause you hate?
You find out your sibling committed a serious crime. Do you turn them in?
Would you forgive a partner who cheated once if they were truly sorry?
Is it okay to lie to a child about Santa Claus?
You can save 100 people but you have to sacrifice yourself. Do you do it?
Would you tell a white lie to avoid hurting someone's feelings?
If you could live forever but never fall in love, would you?
You see someone drop $20. They look wealthy. Do you keep it?
Would you betray a friend to become famous?
Is it wrong to use someone else's WiFi if it's not password protected?
You find a bag of money that belongs to drug dealers. Do you keep it?
Would you help a friend bury a body? (Hypothetically)
Is it okay to test products on animals if it cures cancer?
Would you date your best friend's ex if they gave you permission?
You are given the power to end world hunger, but 50% of the population dies. Do you do it?
Would you tell someone they have spinach in their teeth?
Is it cheating if you flirt online but never meet?
Would you take credit for a coworker's idea if it got you a promotion?
You can save your pet or a random stranger. Who do you save?
Would you reveal a friend's secret if it saved their life?
Is it okay to re-gift a present?
Would you marry for money if you liked the person but didn't love them?
If you could upload your brain to a computer to live forever, would you?
Would you bully someone if it stopped you from being bullied?
You see a parent hitting their child in public. Do you intervene?
Would you rather be happy and poor, or rich and lonely?
Is it okay to ghost someone after one date?
Would you accept a bribe to look the other way?
If you knew your friend's partner was planning to break up with them, would you tell your friend?
Would you plant evidence to convict a known murderer who might walk free?
Is it ethical to eat meat?
Would you sacrifice your privacy for total safety?
You break an expensive vase at a party. No one saw. Do you confess?
Would you tell a dying person a lie to make them happy?
Is it okay to break a law if you think the law is unjust?
Would you choose to know the date of your death?
You are a doctor. You can save 5 patients by killing 1 healthy patient for organs. Do you do it?
Would you hook up with a friend's crush?
If you could sell 5 years of your life for $5 million, would you?
Would you tell your friend if their outfit looked bad?
Is it okay to keep a lost dog if it has no collar/chip?
Would you snitch on a friend to save yourself from jail?
If you could erase a bad memory from someone else's mind, would you?
